Nightlight:

Nightlight vaguely heard Aerotaur's voice, she didn't sure if she was 
dreamming or not. She was stunned and weak. Door's hole was bigger 
every minute, soon Aerotaur could be come in.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He continued hacking at the door with the blades until there is 
an 
> opening large enough for him to see through.  He peers into the 
room and 
> spots Nightlight cowering not too far away.  "Hang on.  I'll be 
through in a 
> minute."  He begins making the hole bigger.
